nodes.documentation:
@notice Setup the loan request with the borrower address and the loan amount
@dev only the owner (or the loan broker in this case) can setup the borrowing info.
nodes.name: request

nodes.documentation:
@notice Deposit fund to the contract balance
@dev Anyone other than the owner and borrower in this case.
nodes.name: depositFund
refund

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdrawing the fund deposited by the lender to borrower account.
@dev The withdraw only allow after 1 day of the loan is fully funded.
nodes.name: withdrawToBorrower

nodes.documentation: @notice borrower repay the loan amount to the contract address
nodes.name: repay

nodes.documentation:
@notice Widthdraw fund from contract balance back to lender according to the loan amount
@dev The withdraw only allow after 2 day of the loan is fully repaid.
nodes.name: withdrawToLenders
onlyAfter

devdoc.details: This contract is created out of demonstrate one of the security best practices of writing solidty contract  and also a different test cases is written specifically for it.

depositFund(uint256).details: Anyone other than the owner and borrower in this case.

info().details: a web helper function get loan properties in one function  instead of calling multiple getter function where the code is now readable.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

lenderAddressAt(uint256).details: helper function to get lender address by index

lenderAt(uint256).details: helper function to get lender from the mapping

params.idx: the index position in lender address mapping

lenderBy(address).details: helper function to get lender by its address
lenderBy(address).return: lender's address, lending amount, and repaid amount in tuples.

lenderCount().return: number of lenders for this contract

loanAmount().return: the loan amount requested by the borrower

ownedAmount().return: the amount withdraw by the borrower

refund().details: It can only refund when the borrower hasn't withdrawn the fund. Only owner (contract brodker) can execute the refund.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

request(address,uint256).details: only the owner (or the loan broker in this case) can setup the borrowing info.

resume().details: only only can execute this function

status().return: current status according to the loan lifecycle

stop().details: only owner can execute this function.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdrawToBorrower().details: The withdraw only allow after 1 day of the loan is fully funded.

withdrawToLenders().details: The withdraw only allow after 2 day of the loan is fully repaid.

devdoc.title: Time Secured Simple Loan

depositFund(uint256).notice: Deposit fund to the contract balance

refund().notice: Return the deposit fund to lender

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

repay().notice: borrower repay the loan amount to the contract address

request(address,uint256).notice: Setup the loan request with the borrower address and the loan amount

resume().notice: Take the contract out of suspend state.

stop().notice: Put the contract in suspend state in the even or ermegency

withdrawToBorrower().notice: Withdrawing the fund deposited by the lender to borrower account.

withdrawToLenders().notice: Widthdraw fund from contract balance back to lender according to the loan amount

userdoc.notice: Time secured loan inherit simple loan but with time protected modifier on the withdrawToBorrower and withdrawToLenders so the fund can't transfer out from the contract account until the waiting period reached.
